post:
2 Months Hosting + 25% Lifetime Discount + Free Domain on all Web Hosting plans when paid Yearly!

Our shopping cart will show the discount code after you click the "Continue" button. Or you may manually select Yearly and apply the discount code "HD25W" at checkout.

HostXNow provides affordable and reliable web hosting services using the latest cloud infrastructure technology and Intel processors and a minimum of 32 gigabytes of ram. Our services are hosted in the OVH Datacenters in London, UK and Vint Hill, United States. Our services include Unlimited Traffic and up to 2 Gbit/s bandwidth to ensure speed and reliability to clients.

We are offering a great deal for new clients, which includes a free domain name registration - only applies to annual plan (.com, .net, .org, .info, .uk, .co.uk) and receive 25% off with us when using promo code: HD25W

We guarantee 99.9% uptime for ALL of our services and a 30 day money back guarantee, which means if you are not happy with our services within 30 days, we will refund your payment no questions asked.

Moving from another host? Just open a ticket after signing up with us, and we will migrate all of your data for you for free, and it can be as many accounts as you have, with no limits.

For more details, please visit: https://www.hostxnow.com
